KODI.GPUMEM1024: Memory reserved for GPU (Raspberry Pi 2B and higher)
KODI.D_GPUMEM1024: This is the amount of memory reserved for the GPU (1024MB model)
KODI.GPUMEM512: Memory reserved for GPU (Raspberry Pi A+, B, B+ and Zero)
KODI.D_GPUMEM512: This is the amount of memory reserved for the GPU (512MB model)
KODI.GPUMEM256: Memory reserved for GPU (Raspberry Pi A)
KODI.D_GPUMEM256: This is the amount of memory reserved for the GPU (256MB model)
KODI.D_HDMIHOTPLUG: Determines whether HDMI should be considered hotplug
KODI.DD_USEDAC: If you are using a HifiBerry AMP, you need to disable the Volumio startup sound.
KODI.AUDIODELAY: Configure sound delay (in seconds; decimal separator is a dot)
KODI.D_AUDIODELAY: Set delay in Kodi your soundcard (e.g. Kali = 0.7s)
KODI.D_KODI_GUI_SOUNDS: En- or disable Kodi GUI sounds
KODI.KODI_AUDIO_KEEPALIVE: Have Kodi keep the audio device alive
KODI.D_KODI_AUDIO_KEEPALIVE: Whether or not to keep the audio device alive.
KODI.D_KODI_ENABLE_WEBSERVER: En- or disable Kodi webserver; i.e. for controlling Kodi through the browser
KODI.D_KODI_WEBSERVER_PORT: The port over which the webserver is exposed in Kodi
KODI.D_KODI_WEBSERVER_USERNAME: The username used to connect to the web interface
KODI.D_KODI_WEBSERVER_PASSWORD: The password used to connect to the web interface
KODI.RESTARTMESSAGE: Boot configuration has been changed, a restart is required for the settings to apply.
